comment.author: 42400804@N05
comment._content: is this what happens when you build a town on a swamp??  I believe that Perth too is built on water!

comment.author: 78043148@N02
comment._content: Brisbane isn't built on a swamp. It is built on a large river that floods every few years. The town was sited where it is because of easy transport for goods by the river in those days. They didn't know about the flooding at first, and when they did find out, they probably thought it wouldn't happen again, my, how wrong they were!
